method.text: Cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the orange rind and then the egg.
Sieve together the flour, baking powder and salt. Beat this into the mixture, alternating with the milk. Finally fold in the loganberries.
Spoon the mixture into muffin tins lined with muffin paper cases. Place in the oven for 30 min or until muffins are well risen and golden.
Allow to cool for 5-10 min on a wire rack. Eat while still warm.
